description:
Very useful in managing activities, more a simple and easy to understand UI/UX display.

Thanks developer
This apps looks great and works great. It's perfectly integareted with GNOME. It would be great you could set a title on the empty space at the top of the note.

As a person who often uses sticky notes to keep track of thoughts, this is exactly what I wanted. Simple, accessible, and responsive. So much so that I almost use it more than real sticky notes when I'm at my desk these days since I can type faster than I can write. It's basically the perfect thing for someone who uses sticky notes but often finds that they can quickly clutter a workspace or get lost easily. The sticky notes default to standard size but I also really appreciate the ability to resize their windows as needed, plus the ability to change colors on-the-fly is really helpful for organization.

Literally the only thing I would want for my own personal sake is some sort of doodle pad component for very rough sketches since I have a tendency to add visuals to my sticky notes in real life, but that's me really reaching. There's a beauty to its simplicity that I almost don't want to be disturbed if I'm being totally honest. It does what it says and does it perfectly.
I hope this replaces the less than stellar Gnome Notes app. Although, I would like a way to export notes as MD or text files.

This is exactly what I was looking for. You can have multiple sticky notes, scattered across your screen, and they automatically save their contents. When you close and re-open the app your notes come back. The pastel color scheme is elegant. Perfect 👌🏽!
Hope to see coloured fonts & text sizes in the next update soon!
A good note-taking app for desktop.

For those familiar with the Windows sticky notes application, the layout and features here are similar. This is a no-nonsense app with basic text formatting features and nice custom sticky note colors to choose from. Good stuff right here
Great little note App
Great app but will not remember its size and location when closed and re-open on the Manjaro KDE and it would be nice if there was an option to start on startup.

Great little app, does exactly what you'd expect. The only complaint I have is that the formatting bar at the bottom is always visible regardless of what size the note is, meaning the note content isn't visible due to the formatting bar on smaller notes. 

This application is clearly inspired by the Windows Sticky Notes app and that hides the formatting options on notes if the window size is reduced, it would be really good if the same feature was implemented in this application. Otherwise a great little app and I'm looking forward to future updates.
Thank you for your effort.
I like the UI, but not support chinese.
But doesn't retain it's size and position
High quality, simple note taking app. Floating sticky notes are awesome. Just what I needed.
Yes best note app

If you like the Windows sticky note app that included all your notes in a central window, this is the replacement Linux app you want. Most Sticky Note apps do just that, create a note but nowhere to minimse it when not needed. This ones just like the Windows app with very similar features. 

The only thing that could make this app better would be:
- Title bars at the top of the note
- When creating a new note, open it near the actual app instead of in the middle of the monitor (I have my notes off to the right).
- Add check boxes for to-do lists.
Other than that, great little app for Linux users.

BTW Had a little trouble trying to install on KDE, but updated the system, tried again and installed easy this time.
summary: Very Much Like The Windows Version

description:
I've been looking for a simple sticky notes app like this, so it's nice to see one on here.
However, the performance is worse than you would expect for a simple text editing app, and, eh, I would prefer if the header were always visible.
Aside from that, it's very clean.
i like it, i even find it better that windows sitcky notes

I did not expect much from this kind of app, but I cannot even change a size of fonts, can just choose between bold, italic, underline, and strikethrough.

No any cool features needed - nor alarm clock (but would be very super to have it there), nor anything else. Just add more changeable fonts properties.

The best implementation of sticky notes. Excellent work!

Try it in combination with the "Unmess" GNOME Shell Extension to have a virtual desktop just for your notes.
I hope that it gets maintained forever!
summary: Using it for a long time with no problems

description: Simple, works great, and looks beautiful!
Exactly what I was looking for, I appreciate that it's not a rich text editor, makes it easy to copy/paste from anywhere without worrying about inconsistent formatting.
Works amazingly
Gran aplicación
Me gustaría saber cómo dejar abrir esta aplicación al inicio. Uso Fedora 38 con GNOME 44.1. Saludos!
C'est une bonne application

Enfin une application de notes - autocollantes- qui fonctionne correctement, je veux dire aussi bien que celle de Windows...
 
Après l'avoir installé sur Fedora 38 / KDE, elle ne fontionnait pas correctement et j'avais eu pour première intention de la supprimer dès le lendemain... Heureusement que non, le lendemain, comme souvent, une mise à jour et cette appli me semble à présent même mieux que celle de Windows. Bref je la conseille vivement.
Приложение отлично вписывается в GNOME, и также отлично работает на linux-смартфоне. Oneplus6/postmarketOS❤️
Очень крутое приложение! Всем советую!
